comments:
Build: integration build 20020502
I'm not sure if this is jdt or a ui problem. But this occured when
double-clicking on a java file that was already opened in an editor. The error
is show everytime I either double-click or try and close the opened editor:

The action crash happens inside eclipse.ui moving one layer down for 
investigation.

Sounds like a dup of bug 14932, which should have been fixed in 0502.
There's also code in there now to catch any runtime exceptions and simply log 
them.
Is it possible you were running an earlier build (0501 before rebuild?)

It is possible, but then I did write down the build number in the original PR. 
FYI, I haven't seen this problem since.

Marking as dup since this stack shouldn't be possible with the fix and check.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14932 ***
